snippet.title: Gentlemen Dispute - Gameplay (Indie Speed Run 2013)
snippet.description:
This is a game we made in 48 hours for the Indie Speed Run event http://indiespeedrun.com/devsite/ ! It should available on their website early october.

Our themes were Focus and Top Hat, and the game is about two gentlemen battling each other with their top hats. They can suspend time around them (focus), which freezes their head in a particular angle. They can charge / attack in that angle!

The goal is to charge into your opponent's hat to bump it off. First gentlemen to win 5 rounds wins the game!

Music credits: 
http://minoff.newgrounds.com/
http://epicrpgremixes.newgrounds.com/

You can also follow us on:
Our website: http://juicybeast.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/juicybeast
Twitter: https://twitter.com/juicybeast
Google+: https://plus.google.com/108157607990849336850/posts
Pinterest: http://www.pinterest.com/juicybeastgames/
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/juicybeaststudio
